trans-unit.source: In a console application, since events are assigned to threads out of a thread pool, you might receive update progress events out of order, with a subsequent event showing a decrease compared to a previous event.
trans-unit.target: 在控制台应用程序，因为事件分配给外线程池线程可能会收到更新进度事件无序，与后续事件显示降低相比的上一个事件。

trans-unit.source: You will not see such behavior in a Windows Forms application, because events in Windows Forms are processed sequentially out of the UI thread's message queue.
trans-unit.target: 因为从 UI 线程的消息队列按顺序处理 Windows 窗体中的事件，你将不会看到在 Windows 窗体应用程序，这种行为。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs> in the context of an application that uses <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager> to download and install a ClickOnce application programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将<xref:System.Deployment.Application.DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs>使用的应用程序的上下文中<xref:System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager>下载并以编程方式安装 ClickOnce 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes downloaded to the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 获取下载到本地计算机的字节数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> representing the number of downloaded bytes.
trans-unit.target: 表示下载的字节数的 <see cref="T:System.Int64" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the progress state of the download.
A <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState" /> value describing which portion of the ClickOnce application is being downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 描述正在下载 ClickOnce 应用程序的哪一部分的 <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of bytes for the download operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取下载操作的总字节数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> representing the total size of the download, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 表示下载总大小（以字节为单位）的 <see cref="T:System.Int64" />。
